programme.title: Halcón Negro
programme.desc: Upon Dario's return to his hometown, from which he had been absent for a long time, his lifelong friend Cenobio informed him of the extortions, kidnappings, and violence suffered by the town by the Calaveras, a group of thugs and ruthless killers who have taken over the region.

programme.title: Los Pistoleros
programme.desc: In search of money, women and fame, a group of friends enter the world of the mafia as hired guns.

programme.title: Las Dos Michoacanas
programme.desc: Chole and Martha are courageous sisters, who love each other and support without hesitation. They also both work for the same Drug dealer, one who gave Chole a higher position than Martha's in his organization.

programme.title: Head On A Plate
programme.desc: A shapeshifting Alien from outer space wreaks havoc on a small rural town in the American Southwest near the legendary Area 51 of UFO fame. These Extraterrestrials are a brain-eating race who love to behead and eat humans. They are among us and have been for millions of years.

programme.title: Lair Of The Killer Clowns
programme.desc: A paranormal researcher discovers a hellish no-man’s-land in a remote forgotten desert landscape where evil clowns await in an otherworldly purgatory to face their fate as payback for their evil deeds

programme.title: El Ultimo Cuerpo
programme.desc: The murder of a transvestite awakes in journalist Heriberto Camargo a thirst for the truth. In his investigation, he discovers that this crime is not isolated, but part of a string of brutal police officer killings apparently committed by Vincent, a renowned sicario.

programme.title: Encargo
programme.desc: When Willi receives a wrong call asking for a weird errand to do, he decides to follow his friend José Manuel advice and take it. That decision changes his life forever after he becomes entangled in a web of mob bosses, kidnappings and robberies.

programme.title: Las Caras Del Diablo
programme.desc: Pedro Ramirez is a junior detective obsessed with the murder of a minor. Three years after the crime, her daughter Sarah is kidnapped in very similar circumstances, starting a unstoppable manhunt to capture the criminal.

programme.title: Underneath
programme.desc: On a seemingly average morning, Eric Linton awakens to a text message from his wife Andrea, pleading with him to sign the divorce papers and allow her to move on with her life. His home is quiet and empty, with pictures of his wife and son Mathew as a constant reminder of what his life once was. As Eric gets ready for work, he is confronted by Shane, a sketchy stranger whose car apparently broke down on the street, and who wants to come in from the cold to use a phone...

programme.title: Todo Por La Taquilla
programme.desc: Cesar, Alfredo, David and Manuel meet after years at a friend's wake. Together, they decide to film the first Venezuelan western in history. As expected, it won't be easy. Specially since their become the target of Waldemar, a notorious gangster whom their dead friend had a huge debt.

programme.title: The Golfball
programme.desc: Sparkles and downsides of thirty-somethings looking for success in L.A.

programme.title: El Abogado Del Diablo
programme.desc: The Ramirez, Cesar and his uncle Marco want to avenge the death of Cesar's father, by the sons of the lawyer Jorge Moncada on his orders to keep all his assets.

programme.title: El Corrido Del 8
programme.desc: The family of Pedro, a Drug Lord, is merciless killed. The AKA El 8 looks for his brother to help him recruit the best hitmen in the region and start a deadly chase against those who murdered his loved ones.
